Q_DESC:
The new node is added after the given node of the given Linked List. For example if the given Linked List is 5->10->15->20->25 and we add an item 30 after node 15, then the Linked List becomes 5->10->15->30->20->25.
Since a Linked List is typically represented by the head of it, we have to traverse the list till node and then insert the node.

INPUT
First line contains the number of datas- N. Second line contains N integers(the given linked list).
Third line contains the node P after which the node to be inserted. Fourth line contain the node X to be inserted.

OUTPUT
case 1(node P found in Linked list) :
Display the final Linked List.
case 2(node P not found in Linked list) :
Print Node not found!
Display the Linked list.
